forumNotes.author: bootable
forumNotes.content:
Is anybody knows; how to make a Usb stick bootable from iso image, "wihtout exracting .iso image"?  
Make bootable USB and copy .iso image to usb directly, and boot?  
Is it possible?  

Thanx...

forumNotes.author: erwan.l
forumNotes.content:
Hi,  

grub4dos will do it for you.  

Regards,  
Erwan.

forumNotes.author: wimb
forumNotes.content:
You can use **BOOT_IMG.exe** of **U_XP_SET** package to Install your ISO files in grub4dos menu on existing bootable USB-stick.  

On the other hand you can use **Make_USB.exe** to create bootable USB-stick with grub4dos menu for your ISO files.  

[http://www.911cd.net...showtopic=21883](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=21883 "External link")  

![:thumbup:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/thumbup.gif)
